path: artifacts/Realblock Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

project_path.CommonBEP20: contracts/Realblock Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits/CommonBEP20

findings.title: Ownership Transfer must be a Two-step Process
findings.description: The transferOwnership() function allows the current owner to transfer his privileges to another address, but it may not be enough protection.

findings.title: Unlocked pragma (pragma solidity ^0.7.0)
findings.description: The contract has a floating solidity pragma version which may introduce bugs.

findings.title: Absence of Adequate Code Comments
findings.description: Inadequate code comments in the ServicePayer abstract contract.
